name: schedule
reason: 轻量级，API 简洁，适合简单的定时任务
minimal_usage_notes:
import schedule
import time
def job():
    print('Running task...')
schedule.every().day.at('10:00').do(job)
while True:
    schedule.run_pending()
    time.sleep(60)
# 支持 every().hour, every().monday, every(10).minutes 等
fallback: 使用系统 cron (Linux/Mac) 或 Task Scheduler (Windows)
